mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_invoice( id, contractId, invoicePlanId, planInvoiceDate, factInvoiceDate, planPaymentDate, factPaymentDate, companyPayId, companySaleId, payeeId, checkId, billingId, amt, rate, amtOfTax, amtTax, remark,invoiceState, state, createDate, updateDate,applicationId ) VALUES ( #{id},#{contractId},#{invoicePlanId},#{planInvoiceDate},#{factInvoiceDate},#{planPaymentDate},#{factPaymentDate}, #{companyPayId},#{companySaleId},#{payeeId},#{checkId},#{billingId},#{amt},#{rate}, #{amtOfTax},#{amtTax},#{remark},#{invoiceState},#{state},#{createDate},#{updateDate},#{applicationId} )
select $uuid()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_invoice WHERE id = #{id} AND state != 1

SELECT i.*,cp.companyName companyPayName,cs.companyName companySaleName,ip.planAmt planAmt FROM t_invoice i LEFT JOIN t_company cp ON i.companyPayId = cp.id LEFT JOIN t_company cs ON i.companySaleId = cs.id LEFT JOIN t_invoice_plan ip ON ip.id = i.invoicePlanId WHERE i.id = #{id} AND i.state != 1
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_invoice i WHERE i.applicationId = #{applicationId} AND i.state != 1

SELECT i.*,cp.companyName companyPayName,cs.companyName companySaleName,up.name payeeName,uc.name checkName,ub.name billingName,ct.contractNo contractNo FROM t_invoice i LEFT JOIN t_company cp ON i.companyPayId = cp.id LEFT JOIN t_company cs ON i.companySaleId = cs.id LEFT JOIN t_user up ON i.payeeId = up.id LEFT JOIN t_user uc ON i.payeeId = uc.id LEFT JOIN t_user ub ON i.billingId = ub.id LEFT JOIN t_contract ct ON i.contractId = ct.id WHERE i.applicationId = #{applicationId} AND i.state != 1 LIMIT #{pageStart} , #{pageSize};
